abilities.title: The Dark Master (Aura)
abilities.description: The area of the battlefield within 6" of this model is considered to be within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

abilities.title: Shadow Form
abilities.description: At the start of the battle round, select one Shadow Form ability (see below). Until the end of the battle round, this model has that ability.

choices.title: Wreathed in Shadows (Aura, Psychic)
choices.description: While a friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can only be targeted by a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

choices.title: Pall of Despair (Aura, Psychic)
choices.description: In the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of this model, that unit must take a Battle-shock test. For the purposes of this ability, if a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, it is considered to be below its Starting Strength while it has lost one or more wounds.

choices.title: Shadow Lord (Aura, Psychic)
choices.description: While a friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock and Leadership tests taken for that unit.

equipped.what: Betraying Shades, the Blade of Shadows.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.title: Supreme Commander
other.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

abilities.title: Bloodmaster
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.title: A Gory Path
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit Consolidates, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

bloodthirster.title: Bloodthirster
wargearoptions: This model's great axe of Khorne can be replaced with 1 axe of Khorne and one of the following: 1 bloodflail, 1 lash of Khorne.

abilities.title: Daemon Lord of Khorne (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.title: Relentless Carnage
abilities.description: At the end of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll eight D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.title: Greater Daemon of Khorne (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, that unit is within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

equipped.what: Hellfire breath, great axe of Khorne.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.title: Changecaster
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.title: Storm of Mutating Sorcery (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy Infantry unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.title: Swallow Energy (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.

abilities.title: Horrible Fascination (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of your opponent's Shooting phase, one PSYKER model from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to that PSYKER model and roll one D6: on a 1, that PSYKER model suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; on a 6, that enemy unit is not eligible to shoot this phase.

abilities.title: Prince of Darkness (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

abilities.title: Unholy Vigour
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 3+ invulnerable save.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Khorne (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the KHORNE keyword, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of this model's hellforged weapons.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the TZEENTCH keyword, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's infernal cannon.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Nurgle (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the NURGLE keyword, add 1 to this model's Toughness characteristic.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the SLAANESH keyword, add 2" to this model's Move characteristic.

other.title: Daemonic Allegiance
other.description: When you select this model to include in your army, you must select one of the following keywords for it to gain: KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE, SLAANESH. The keyword you select will also affect some of this model's characteristics, as stated above.

daemonprinceofchaoswithwings.title: Daemon Prince Of Chaos With Wings

abilities.title: Malefic Destruction (Aura)
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's hellforged weapons.

abilities.title: Unholy Vigour
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities. Until the end of the phase, this model's hellforged weapons have that ability: [LETHAL HITS], [PRECISION], [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Khorne (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the KHORNE keyword, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of this model's hellforged weapons.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the TZEENTCH keyword, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's infernal cannon.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Nurgle (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the NURGLE keyword, add 1 to this model's Toughness characteristic.

choices.title: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh (Aura)
choices.description: If this model has the SLAANESH keyword, add 2" to this model's Move characteristic.

models: 1 Daemon Prince of Chaos With Wings

other.title: Daemonic Allegiance
other.description: When you select this model to include in your army, you must select one of the following keywords for it to gain: KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE, SLAANESH. The keyword you select will also affect some of this model's characteristics, as stated above.

keywords: Daemon Prince of Chaos with Wings

abilities.title: Blessed by the Plague God
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.title: Tally of Pestilence
abilities.description: Keep a tally of how many enemy models are destroyed by NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA models from your army during the battle. At the start of your Command phase, if this tally is 7 or more, you gain 1CP and the tally is reset to 0.

abilities.title: Blazing Warpfire (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

abilities.title: Flames of Change (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) hit by one or more of those attacks, and roll one D6. On a 4+, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is aflame. While a unit is aflame, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

other.title: Manifestation of Destruction
other.description: This model cannot be your Warlord and cannot be given Enhancements.

abilities.title: Fateskimmer
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.title: Rider of the Immaterial Winds
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, if this model's unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

equipped.what: Arcane Fireball, Herald combat weapon, Screamer bites.

abilities.title: Fluxmaster
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack is made against that unit, subtract 1 form the Hit roll.

abilities.title: Altered Reality (Aura)
abilities.description: Once per battle round, after a Hit roll, a Wound roll or a saving throw is made for this model, you can change the result of that roll to a 6.

greatuncleanone.title: Great Unclean One
wargearoptions: This model's plague flail can be replaced with 1 bileblade.
This model's bilesword can be replaced with 1 doomsday bell.

abilities.title: Daemon Lord of Nurgle (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

abilities.title: Nurgle's Rot (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. Until the start of your next Movement phase, subtract 1 from the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.title: Greater Daemon of Nurgle (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, that unit is within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

wargearabilities.title: Reverberating Summons
wargearabilities.description: Each time a model is destroyed by this weapon, you can select one friendly PLAGUEBEARER'S unit within 12" of the bearer and return 1 destroyed Plaguebearer model to that unit.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.title: Beast Handler
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, once per battle, you can target that unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

abilities.title: Seed the Garden of Nurgle
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, if this model is within one Area Terrain feature, until the end of the battle, that AREA TERRAIN feature is considered to be within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

abilities.title: Harmonic Alignment
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

abilities.title: Discordant Disruption (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy PSYKER unit is within 12" of this model, Psychic weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

abilities.title: One Head Looks Forward (Aura)
abilities.description: Each time you target a friendly TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit within 6" of this model with a Stratagem, roll one D6: if the result is greater than the current battle round number, you gain 1CP.

abilities.title: Lord of Deceit (Aura)
abilities.description: Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.title: Greater Daemon of Tzeentch (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6" of this model, that unit is within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.title: Pack Leader
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.title: Prey of the Blood God
abilities.description: At the start of the first battle round, select one enemy unit to be this model's prey. Weapons equipped by models in this model's unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability when targeting this model's prey. Each time this model's prey is destroyed, select one new enemy unit to be this model's prey.

wargearabilities.title: Collar of Khorne
wargearabilities.description: The bearer has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.
